title: Report MMR boost ?
body:
One of my friend irl is currently getting elo boost from plat 5 to Challenger. I have never played with her in game to give her a report. But i submitted 2 ticket  to report her account. But it seem useless. Are there any chance to report this type elo boost ( they don't advertise or anything ).
Her lolking account : _Removed_
Checkout her elo : 1 months from Plat 5 to Challenger.

tldr; IGN : "_Name Removed_" getting elo boosted

replies.body: Riot gives 0 sh its, they only care about $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$${{champion:32}}
Why would you go out of your way to try and get your friend banned
You won't get any if you report her {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

**Riot** support are the best people to handle this, just give them a few days and they should reply back. 

Keep in mind though, they're not going to ban anyone on the spot just because you claim they're getting elo boosting. **Riot** will go through their investigative process and then ban once they're sure your friend is elo boosted. The punishment for elo boosting is quite severe so it's important they get it right the first time.
